definition: the position on a baseball team of the player who throws the ball for a batter to try to hit, form into a rounded elevation
details:
noun
- the position on a baseball team of the player who throws the ball for a batter to try to hit
= synonyms: pitcher
- structure consisting of an artificial heap or bank usually of earth or stones
= example: structure consisting of an artificial heap or bank usually of earth or stones
= synonyms: hill
- (baseball) the slight elevation on which the pitcher stands
= synonyms: hill, pitcher's mound
- a collection of objects laid on top of each other
= synonyms: agglomerate, pile, heap, cumulation, cumulus
- a small natural hill
= synonyms: hammock, knoll, hillock, hummock
verb
- form into a rounded elevation
= example: form into a rounded elevation
